#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int Ar[5000006];
char A[5000006];

int main()
{
    //ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    scanf("%s",&A);

    while(!(A[0]=='E'))
    {

        int l=0;
        int i=0,j=-1;
        Ar[0]=-1,Ar[1]=0;
        while(A[i]!='\0')
        {
            while(j>=0&&A[j]!=A[i])j=Ar[j];
            i++,j++;
            Ar[i]=j;
            if(A[i]=='\0') printf("%d",Ar[i]);//cout<<Ar[i];
            else printf("%d ",Ar[i]);//cout<<Ar[i]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<"\n";

        scanf("%s",&A);
    }
    return 0;
}
